testcase.classname: Verify address details in checkout page
testcase.name: Test Case 23
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks 'Signup / Login' button to to start registtartion..........passed Then User fills all details in Signup and create account....................passed Then Verify 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' and click 'Continue' button..................passed Then Verify ' Logged in as username' at top.................................passed Then User adds products to cart.............................................passed Then User click 'Cart' button...............................................passed Then Verify that cart page is displayed.....................................passed Then User clicks Proceed To Checkout........................................passed Then Verify that the delivery address is same address filled at the time registration of account.passed Then Verify that the billing address is same address filled at the time registration of account.passed Then User clicks 'Delete Account' button to delete account..................passed Then Verify ACCOUNT DELETED! and click Continue button to go on.............passed
